title: Kanchana discusses Power & Energy with US Ambassador
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekera met with US Ambassador to Sri Lanka Julie J. Chung on Thursday (26).
He said that he shared all plans for the transformation of the Power and Energy sectors and the immediate proposed solutions in place for the power and energy crisis.
He further said that he hoped to work closely with the US to transform the 2 sectors in the country.
